fields.description: Whether OS image rollback feature should be disabled.
fields.name: DisableAutomaticRollback

fields.description:
Indicates whether OS upgrades should automatically be applied to scale set instances in a rolling fashion when a newer version of the OS image becomes available.

If this is set to true for Windows based pools, [WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/batchmanagement/pool/create?tabs=HTTP#windowsconfiguration) cannot be set to true.
fields.name: EnableAutomaticOSUpgrade

fields.description: Defer OS upgrades on the TVMs if they are running tasks.
fields.name: OsRollingUpgradeDeferral

fields.description: Indicates whether rolling upgrade policy should be used during Auto OS Upgrade. Auto OS Upgrade will fallback to the default policy if no policy is defined on the VMSS.
fields.name: UseRollingUpgradePolicy
